headline: Does Allstate’s 12% Rally Signal a New Opportunity After Recent Strategic Moves?
summary: Wondering if Allstate stock is really a good deal right now? Let’s dig into whether the current price makes sense or if investors should be looking elsewhere for value. Allstate has seen its share price climb over the past month, up 12.1%, and it is holding onto an 11.0% gain so far this year, despite a slight dip of 0.6% this week. These price moves have been shaped by broader optimism in the insurance sector, as well as headlines spotlighting Allstate’s recent initiatives to streamline...
